snippet: The bridge is already stretched beyond its projected 50-year lifespan and carries 40 percent more vehicles daily than the 100,000 originally anticipated, the Cuomo administration has plans to accelerate its replacement.
abstract: The bridge is already stretched beyond its projected 50-year lifespan and carries 40 percent more vehicles daily than the 100,000 originally anticipated, the Cuomo administration has plans to accelerate its replacement.

headline.main: In Tappan Zee Replacement, Location Adds to the Cost
headline.print_headline: Tappan Zee Bridge’s Location Adds to the Cost of Its Replacement
